pkgmetadata.longdescription: # vnetconfig## _Package for extacting credentila for vNet - Internal Use_## Features- Connect to RDS Cluster for Multiple Env- Get S3object based on ENV as well custom RoleArn## Installationvnetconfig requires [Python 3](https://www.python.org/download/releases/3.0/) to run.Install the dependencies by.```pip install vnetconfig==0.1.25```## Method AvailableUse below python function for connecting RDS ClusterRds Connect:```from vnet.config import *auroraConnect(env,accessType)```get S3Object:```get_s3Object(bucket_name, object_path, expiration=60, roleArn="None", env="None")```## LicenseMIT**Internal Use only!**
